host.title: Host
host.description: The hostname or IP address of the UniFi Controller, including port if necessary (e.g., '192.168.1.1:8443').

username.title: Username
username.description: The username for the UniFi Controller.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for the UniFi Controller.

includeIds.title: Include Device IDs
includeIds.description: A comma seperated list of device IDs to include.

excludeIds.title: Exclude Device IDs
excludeIds.description: A comma seperated list of device IDs to exclude.
